definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: bowl, basin (Talm. [[אוֹגׇן]], Aram. [[אַגׇּנׇא]], 0agm0no0o; Ar. 0’ij=a0nah;un , vessel in which clothes are washed; As. (pl.) aganâtē Dl:W).
[[אַגַּן הַסַּהַר]], sim. of curves of body Ct So 7:3.
metaph. of family of Eliakim. [[כְּלֵי הָאַגׇּנוֹת]] = basin-vessels Is 22:24 (= bowl-shaped vessels Che) opp. [[כְּלֵי]] [[הַנְּכָלִים]]; both ‖[[כְּלֵי הַקָּטָן]].
